pullrequest.title: send world name as argument  in sim commands

content.raw:
Louise, Ian: I've pushed a new commit that:

* attachs the current date as part of the world name. Note that this world name is an invented ID we pass to src scripts to let them find the same folders and files. A way to associate scripts from the same world invocation.
I've added the date to avoid potentially overriding logs , as we discussed in the meeting notes.

* I've also added a 2nd argument to run_gazebo invocation , with the world "number". If I recall correctly , this number will be needed by the roslaunch used in the finals.
content.html:
Louise, Ian: I've pushed a new commit that:

  • attachs the current date as part of the world name. Note that this world name is an invented ID we pass to src scripts to let them find the same folders and files. A way to associate scripts from the same world invocation. I've added the date to avoid potentially overriding logs , as we discussed in the meeting notes.

  • I've also added a 2nd argument to run_gazebo invocation , with the world "number". If I recall correctly , this number will be needed by the roslaunch used in the finals.
